snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby is expected back for their game against the Rangers on Thursday night in a key game in the Eastern Conference race.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby is expected to return from injury for game against the New York Rangers in a key matchup in the Eastern Conference race.

byline.contributor: Jeff Z. Klein contributed reporting from Boca Raton, Fla.

lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby is expected back for their game against the Rangers on Thursday night in a key game in the Eastern Conference race.

headline.seo: Sidney Crosby to Return to Lineup Against New York Rangers
headline.main: Crosby Is Ready to Face the Rangers
headline.print_headline: Crosby Is Ready to Face the Rangers
